code: import React,{useEffect,useMemo,useState}from"react";import"./SkillSection.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SkillSection=()=>{const skills=useMemo(()=>[{name:"HTML - 5",percentage:70},{name:"CSS - 3",percentage:50},{name:"Tailwind",percentage:40},{name:"JavaScript",percentage:25},{name:"React",percentage:10},{name:"MongoDB",percentage:25}],[]);const[animatedPercentages,setAnimatedPercentages]=useState(skills.map(()=>0));useEffect(()=>{skills.forEach((skill,index)=>{let currentPercent=0;const interval=setInterval(()=>{if(currentPercent<=skill.percentage){setAnimatedPercentages(prev=>{const newPercentages=[...prev];newPercentages[index]=currentPercent;return newPercentages;});currentPercent++;}else{clearInterval(interval);}},15);});},[skills]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"skill-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"skill-heading",children:"My Skills"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-container",children:skills.map((skill,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",style:{background:`conic-gradient(#FF520E ${animatedPercentages[index]*3.6}deg, #333 0deg)`},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"inner-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"percentage",children:[animatedPercentages[index],"%"]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skill-name",children:skill.name})]},index))})]});};export default SkillSection;
